sofya.base
Class Utility

java.lang.Object
  sofya.base.Utility

public final class Utility
extends java.lang.Object

Defines general utility methods that belong to no class in particular.

Version:
01/18/2007
Author:
Alex Kinneer

Nested Class Summary
static class Utility.IntegerPtr
          Helper class to serve as a "pointer" to an integer value, for use in returning multiple values from functions.

typeToClass

public static final java.lang.Class typeToClass(org.apache.bcel.generic.Type t)
                                         throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
Converts a BCEL Type object to its corresponding java.lang.Class.

Parameters:
t - BCEL type object to be converted.
Returns:
The class object corresponding to the given BCEL type.
Throws:
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - If the corresponding class cannot be found by the classloader (most often because it is not on the classpath), or if the BCEL type is Type.UNKNOWN.

typesToClasses

public static final java.lang.Class[] typesToClasses(org.apache.bcel.generic.Type[] ts)
                                              throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
Converts an array of BCEL Type objects to their corresponding java.lang.Class objects.

Parameters:
ts - BCEL type objects to be converted.
Returns:
The class objects corresponding to the given BCEL types.
Throws:
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - If a corresponding class cannot be found by the classloader (most often because it is not on the classpath), or if a BCEL type is Type.UNKNOWN.

formatElapsedTime

public static final java.lang.String formatElapsedTime(long elapsedMillis)
Formats an elapsed time expressed in milliseconds to the form "hh:mm:ss.dd" (that is, seconds are expressed to two decimal places).

Parameters:
elapsedMillis - Length of elapsed time.
Returns:
The length of time, in the format "hh:mm:ss.dd".

printStackTrace

public static final void printStackTrace(java.io.PrintStream out,
                                         java.lang.String header)
Prints the stack trace for the current thread.

Parameters:
out - Stream to which to print the stack trace.
header - User-supplied information that should be written as a header to the stack trace (can be null).

isParsableInt

public static boolean isParsableInt(java.lang.String s,
                                    Utility.IntegerPtr resultPtr)
Tests whether the string argument can be parsed as a signed decimal integer in radix 10, as described for java.lang.Integer.parseInt(String). If so, the resulting integer value is returned as the value of the integer pointer argument.

Parameters:
s - String to test for parsability as an int.
resultPtr - Integer pointer object into which the parsed result will be written, if the string is parsable as an int.
Returns:
true if the given string can be parsed as a radix 10 int, false otherwise.

isParsableInt

public static boolean isParsableInt(java.lang.String s,
                                    int radix,
                                    Utility.IntegerPtr resultPtr)
Tests whether the string argument can be parsed as a signed decimal integer in the radix given by the second argument, as described for java.lang.Integer.parseInt(String, int). If so, the resulting integer value is returned as the value of the integer pointer argument.

Parameters:
s - String to test for parsability as an int.
resultPtr - Integer pointer object into which the parsed result will be written, if the string is parsable as an int.
Returns:
true if the given string can be parsed as an int in the specified radix, false otherwise.
